results.text: And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.
results.reason: This verse speaks of the divine peace that surpasses human comprehension, offering protection for our inner being.
results.reflection: God's peace is a fortress for our hearts and minds.

results.text: Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.
results.reason: Jesus promises His followers a peace unlike any other, one that calms fears and troubles.
results.reflection: Christ's peace is a gift that dispels fear and anxiety.

results.text: You keep him in perfect peace whose mind is stayed on you, because he trusts in you.
results.reason: This verse highlights how trust in God results in perfect peace.
results.reflection: Fixing our thoughts on God brings a profound sense of peace.

results.text: Let the peace of Christ rule in your hearts, since as members of one body you were called to peace. And be thankful.
results.reason: Christ's peace is meant to govern our hearts, promoting unity and gratitude among believers.
results.reflection: Peace and thankfulness should guide our hearts in community.

results.text: The LORD gives strength to his people; the LORD blesses his people with peace.
results.reason: This verse reassures that God's blessings include both strength and peace.
results.reflection: God's peace is a blessing that empowers and sustains us.
